name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New Tab Page - Home Screen Dashboard

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your browser experience with clean dashboard easily and without clutter!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
New Tab Page - Create Home Screen Dashboard | Manage Bookmarks & Tasks with Our Privacy-Focused Chrome Extension

Looking for a powerful yet minimalist tool to streamline your online experience? DashTab Dashboard combines an advanced Bookmark Manager in your New Tab Page and a Minimalist To-Do List to help you stay organized and productive.

---

**Key Features:**

- üåê Advanced Bookmark Manager: Easily add, edit, organize, and access your essential websites with customizable folders and intuitive drag-and-drop functionality.

- üìù Integrated To-Do List: Manage your tasks efficiently by adding, completing, deleting, and reordering tasks to prioritize your daily activities.

- üñ•Ô∏è Dashboard Customization: Personalize your dashboard with multiple options including customizable backgrounds, bookmark and color adjustment to tailor the interface to your preferences.

- üîí Privacy-Focused: Your data stays within your browser unless you choose to export it. We do not track or store any of your information, ensuring your privacy is always protected.

- üîÑ Export and Import Bookmarks: Backup and transfer your bookmarks effortlessly with support for JSON, CSV, and HTML formats. Merge imported bookmarks without creating duplicates.

- üñºÔ∏è **Favicon Management**: Automatically fetch and display favicons for your bookmarks or generate unique colored icons based on the bookmark's URL for easy identification.

---

**Why Choose DashTab?**

- **Complete Control & Privacy**: Maintain full control over your data with no external storage unless you decide to save it manually.

- **Enhanced Productivity**: Streamline your workflow with easy access to bookmarks and tasks, keeping your digital life organized.

- **User-Friendly Interface**: Enjoy a clean, intuitive design that adapts to your needs, making it simple to manage your surfing experience and to-do lists when you need to organize yourself quickly.

---

**Get Started Today!**

Enhance your browsing experience with a tool that's both powerful and respectful of your privacy. Click "Add to Chrome" and take control of your digital workspace!

---

**Changelog**

0.3 - initial version
0.3.1 - added folder buttons to be draggable
0.3.2 and 0.3.3:
- added changing color of the buttons 
- added uniform button hover + shine effects
- added reset to default color 
- added sidebar width change with dragging

0.3.3.1: 
- fixed bug when sometimes button color would get reverted to the default
- removed window button

0.4
- added margin setting
- added bookmark settings
- updated folders modal
- updated settings modal
- updated color customization to include text
- bugfixes
- removed window button

**Coming soon**

**DashTab** is your all-in-one solution for efficient bookmark management and task organization, ensuring a streamlined and personalized browsing experience. Install DashTab today and take control of your digital workspace!
